name: connect-app
description: This is an API for a social network web application connect-app.  Users can share thoughts, react to friendsâ€™ thoughts, and create a list of friends.  Express.js is used for routing. MongoDB the NoSQL database management program to work with large sets of distributed data is used for the dabatbase to manage document-oriented information, store, model and retrieve information. Mongoose ODM is to manage relationships between data and provide schema validation. Express.js and Mongoose both link to external sites. Day.js, a JavaScript date library, is used to format timestamps.
